channel.title: Twitter on WTF - the terminal dashboard
channel.description: Recent content in Twitter on WTF - the terminal dashboard

item.title: Twitter Stats
item.description: Connects to the Twitter API and displays statistics about the number of tweets and followers for a set of usernames. To make this work, you’ll need a couple of things: A Twitter developer account … and one of the following: a) A Twitter bearer token b) Consumer API keys You must have either a bearer token or consumer key + consumer secret provided. To get the consumer API keys, you must first create a Twitter application.

item.title: Twitter
item.description: Connects to the Twitter API and displays a single user’s tweets. NOTE: This only works for single-application developer accounts for now. To make this work, you’ll need a couple of things: A Twitter developer account … and one of the following: a) A Twitter bearer token b) Consumer API keys You must have either a bearer token or consumer key + consumer secret provided. To get the consumer API keys, you must first create a Twitter application.
